content: You're the only person I want to come back to when it feels like the rest of the world has become too much.
Your bellybutton is kind of adorable.
Hugging you is the only comfort I need.
You're not as dumb as you let people think you are.
You're more of a superhero than any Marvel character out there.
There's a softness behind your eyes.
You look so young!
There's no one like you.
You have the best sense of style.
When you make a mistake, you try to fix it.
You're really something special.
I like your style.
That color is perfect on you.
You could survive a zombie apocalypse.
With you, I'm at peace.
It would be torture to lose you.
There should be a monument of you.
You're better than a triple-scoop ice cream cone. With sprinkles.
The very thought of you makes me feel warm and fuzzy.
You're even better than a unicorn, because you're real.
You are way too smart for me.
You have taught me so much.
Hanging out with you is always a blast.
Your existence has made my life infinitely better since knowing you.
The world would be so boring without you.
Someone is getting through something hard right now because you've got their back.
You help me feel more joy in life.
You have impeccable manners.
You've got all the right moves.
My life before you was utter dullness.
You're really fun to be around. Even when we aren't doing anything at all just being around you makes me feel content.
You have a good head on your shoulders.
I know that you will always have my back, because that is the kind of person you are.
You're the kind of person who could make even Kanye smile.
You are stunning.
Jokes are funnier when you tell them.
You are more fun than anyone or anything I know, including bubble wrap.
Things shift when you enter the chat.
You're inspiring.
Everyday is just BLAH when I don't see you
You're more helpful than you realize.
You are an excellent friend.

You are the light.

When you're not afraid to be yourself is when you're most incredible.
You're a great listener.
I bet you do crossword puzzles in ink.
Your smile is contagious.
You light up the room.
Your ability to recall random factoids at just the right time is impressive.
Aside from food. You're my favorite.
You're an awesome friend.
You should be thanked more often. Thank you.
You're a gift to those around you.
If cartoon bluebirds were real, a bunch of them would be sitting on your shoulders singing right now.
You're my constant reminder that people can be good.
You are one of the bravest people I know.
Your voice soothes me.
You are a life elixir.

There's currently nothing I'd rather do than spend time with you.
You make the little things feel big.
You are my world.
You changed everything for me.
I appreciate the way you challenge me.
I find myself smiling so much more, now that I know you.
You have the courage of your convictions.
When we're both online, the rest of the world melts away.
You're a candle in the darkness.
You have a gift for making people comfortable.
Your outlook on life is amazing.
When it comes to cooking, no one's meals are quite as delicious.
Any team would be lucky to have you on it.
You are so special to me.
You are awesome!
Thank you for being there.
You should be proud of yourself.
Your name suits you to a T.
You are awesomeness personified.
Your soul is gorgeous.
You're so strong.
You're like sunshine on a rainy day.
Your heart must be ten times the average size.
When I see you, everything else within the frame falls away.
You make me want to be a better person.
Wow. You.
Our system of inside jokes is so advanced that only you and I get it. And I like that.
You're the coolest person I know.
You have the best ideas.
How do you keep being so funny and making everyone laugh?
You are my favorite loot roller.
I want to grow into a person like you.
You've got great leadership skills.
You're gorgeous - and that's the least interesting thing about you, too.
You're all that and a super-size bag of chips.
You're that "Nothing" when people ask me what I'm thinking about.
You are really courageous.

When we're both onlne, everything seems possible.

When you say, "I meant to do that," I totally believe you.
Your laugh is my favorite sound.
You make a bigger impact than you realize.
I love the way you bring out the best in people.
Your very presence is reassuring

You are just beyond.

You're one of a kind.
You have cute elbows. For real.
You make me see the world in a way no one else ever has.
You are really kind to people around you.
You just made my day.
I love how precious and child-like you can be sometimes. You make me feel young again.
You make me float up like I'm on millions of bubbles.
Babies and small animals probably love you.
Within seconds of talking to you, I feel better.
Your quirks are so you - and I love that.
You have the best laugh.
I bet you sweat glitter.
You're always learning new things and trying to better yourself. That's awesome.
You are brave.
You always know - and say - exactly what I need to hear when I need to hear it.
Some people are radiators - they make you feel warm when you're around them.
If you died or something happened to you, I would delete your browser history for you.
You're like a ray of sunshine on a really dreary day.
You look great today.

I didn't know how important friendship was until we met.
You always find something special in the most ordinary things.
Is there a day you haven't made better?
You're more fun than a ball pit filled with candy.

You make me feel whole.
Everything seems brighter when you are around.

Your creative potential seems limitless.

I enjoy spending time with you.
Your inside is even more beautiful than your outside.
That color looks perfect on you.
Your energy is infectious.
I know that if you ever make a mistake, you fix it.
You're my favorite person to talk to. I never get tired of hearing your voice, your stories. I always want more.
I think you're the only person I could ever talk about this with openly.
You give me the kind of advice I always need to hear.
You deserve a hug right now.

When I'm down you always say something encouraging to help me feel better.
I tell everyone how amazing you are.

You were cool way before hipsters were cool.
You impress me every single day.
Somehow you make time stop and fly all at the same time.

I don't want to be anywhere you can't be.

When you say you will do something, I trust you.
You have a great sense of humor.
You are a great example to others.
Even the things you don't like about yourself make you interesting.

When you're around, I don't need anything else.
You are one of the strongest people I know.
You just glow.
You are the most perfect you there is.
Your existence makes me feel better about life.
You always know just what to say.
Whenever I have a tough day, I remember you and it gives me strength and hope.
You have such a good heart.
You're great at figuring stuff out.
I love your little pinky toes.
You always know how to find that silver lining.
There's ordinary, and then there's you.
I had no idea what life could be until we met.

You inspire me.

I'm grateful to know you.
Nothing can stop you.
